title: Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. In fact, reading the Qur’an brings comfort and a feeling of security and reassurance, and it is also one of the most important acts of worship. Through which a person approaches his Lord and obtains His satisfaction and favor. But what is the interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream? What is the good news that the dreamer brings? We will learn about this in the following lines of our encyclopedia article.Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a single womanAn unmarried girl who sees herself reading Surat Al-Ikhlas, her dreams indicate that good deeds will come to her and abundant money will come to her.And if she sees Surah repeated Sincerity in a dream: This is good news that a suitor will approach her and be of good character and origin. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream about a pregnant woman. One of the auspicious dreams for a pregnant woman is to see herself reading Surat Al-Ikhlas three times in a dream. It means that this woman’s relationship with God is strong and that she stays away from disobedience and sins as much as she can. Also, seeing her reciting Surat Al-Ikhlas portends a stable pregnancy, and that she will give birth to her child in good health, God willing. It also symbolizes decent living and halal nutrition. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman. Among the interpretations given in a married woman’s vision of Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream is that God Almighty will not provide for her children. It was said in its interpretation: It indicates the calm and stability that she lives with her husband and children. When a woman sees that Surat Al-Ikhlas is echoing in her sleep without knowing the source of the sound. Seeing herself reciting Surat Al-Ikhlas indicates her closeness to God Almighty and heralds the fulfillment of the hopes and expectations that she desires to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream about heaven. Whoever sees in his dream that If one reads Surah Al-Ikhlas over the jinn, his dream indicates piety and deep faith in God Almighty. It was also said: Good news for the monarch that he will occupy a high position. Interpretation of a dream about hearing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is listening to Surat Al-Ikhlas, it is evidence of piety and piety, and it indicates the abundance of goodness that God sends to the dreamer, because it indicates the blessing that will come to him and his family. . And give him good tidings that his efforts to stay away from sin will bring him closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a man. If a man sees in a dream someone reading Surat Al-Ikhlas for him, then this dream is good news that God will answer his prayers, God willing, and fulfill all his desires. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation The dream of a man who recites Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream means that whoever sees this dream his children will die after giving birth to them and no child will live for him. For the young man who sees himself reciting Surat Al-Ikhlas, his visions promise him success and distinction in his studies and obtaining the highest grades, and it is a sign for him at the same time that Continue his diligence and excellence and seek God’s help. Always to help him. Whoever is sick and sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Ikhlas, then this dream indicates the approach of his guardianship, and whoever sees such a dream during his illness, he must renew his repentance to God Almighty and increase that.

title: Interpretation of intercourse with the husband in a dream and intercourse with the husband in a dream

preview.html: I dream of a husband marrying a married woman, a pregnant woman, adultery with someone other than a husband or with my husband, modesty, a lover, a preacher, or a brother of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. This indicates that your married life is in the best condition, but there is a secret in the heart of each of you and he is afraid to reveal it to the other. It means you have something to be afraid of and you. Marriage means a lack of trust in each other, so there must be a peace session between them. The dream of intercourse with your husband is considered a normal and normal dream that reflects something of your personal life and the private intimate habits between you. If you and your husband have not had sex for a while , the dream inevitably reflects your desire for an active sexual life with him. It also reflects your restrained affection and longing for him. Therefore, we advise you to search with him for a solution to get rid of this frozen desire inside you and obtain your right to affection and tenderness. If you see yourself having sex with your husband and you are happy about it, this symbolizes a happy and happy married life. If you dream that you had sex with your husband but you were troubled and anxious, This reflects your disorder in reality and that you have a problem that is bothering you and you need to tell your husband about it in order to improve the relationship. Between youThe dreamer who sees having sexual intercourse with the husband, this indicates the appearance of goodness and benefit in life. The fortuneteller who sees the emergence of semen from the female’s stomach indicates profit and sustenance from lawful money. The soothsayer who sees having sexual intercourse with this husband indicates that this is what he desires and will indeed obtain it. The dreamer may indicate Whoever sees her having sex with her husband indicates that she will be promoted in a job and work, or obtain a sensitive position or a successful job. The dreamer who sees her having sexual intercourse with her husband from the anus, this indicates striving for something that is difficult to achieve and happen, which causes fatigue and exhaustion in life. It is said that this dream indicates a lack of interest in the path of God and faith and the fact that the dreamer is a person far from the Sunnah of God. The dreamer who sees himself having intercourse with his husband while he is already dead, then this dream is not good and there is no good in it. If the fortuneteller is sick, it indicates death. If the viewer is wealthy, then this It indicates poverty and entering into a losing trade or useless financial transactions. The dreamer who sees his wife dead and then comes back to life and has intercourse with her and she was infected with her fluid indicates that a lot of money is spent on the things he is exposed to in life. The dreamer who sees his wife kissing her passionately or asking her to have intercourse indicates That there is good news and pleasant news in his life. The dream may indicate achieving financial gains and profits or solving some of the problems that caused his anxiety. Interpretation of sexual dreams - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting pegs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about collecting pegs in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about collecting pegs in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site clarifies, citing the interpretations. For some working scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about collecting pegs in a dream Collecting pegs in a dream can indicate the radical changes that occur in one’s life during this time. When a person sees that he is collecting pegs, this can indicate good circumstances and good changes that It occurs in the life of that period. If one sees that he is collecting pegs in a dream, this may indicate some disturbances that occurred in his life during those days. If one sees that he is collecting pegs, this may indicate that he is in a crisis or a major problem that the dreamer faces In those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold bullion in a dream: A dream about collecting gold bullion from the ground in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer obtains during this period, thanks to God. Seeing someone collecting gold in a dream may indicate ample sustenance. Which the dreamer will receive in his life during those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he was collecting gold bullion in a dream may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was collecting gold bullion in a dream from the ground It may indicate good decisions made by the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting watches in a dream Collecting wristwatches in a dream may be a sign of a problem that the dreamer will face in his life during those days. Seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream may indicate To fears that the dreamer may face, which will disappear and he needs to ask God for help. It is possible that seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream indicates the debts that the deceased will face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream may indicate The bad news that the dreamer may receive during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting fish from the sea in a dream: In the event that one saw that he was collecting fish, this may indicate the huge source of livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in those days. It may indicate Collecting fish in a dream indicates wealth and abundant money that the dreamer has obtained through God’s grace. Whoever sees in his dream that he is collecting fish from the sea, it may indicate in his speech that he is an honest and truthful person. Seeing sea fish in a dream may indicate difficulties that the dreamer has overcome In his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting rose seeds in a dream: Collecting rose seeds in a dream may indicate the end of fears and the near relief that the dreamer will obtain by God’s grace. Whoever saw in his dream that he was picking rose seeds, it could indicate that he will get rid of Among the problems that the dreamer was facing in those days. Dreaming about collecting rose seeds in a dream could indicate change

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing the death of a dead person again in a dream?

preview.html: Hadota website provides you with an interpretation of seeing the dead again in a complete dream. This vision disturbs many people, and this vision sometimes turns into the beginning of a new life, God knows best. If a person’s relative is imprisoned or in severe distress and sadness, he will be saved from them, God knows best. We have collected for you, dear followers, all the visions and interpretations of the death of the deceased again in a dream for the dead, married, pregnant women and men. Interpretation of seeing the death of the dead again in a dream by Ibn Sirin If a person sees in a dream the complete death of a person who has been buried for a long time, this indicates the disappearance of sadness, distress and anxiety for the dreamer. The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin also says: Seeing the death of a relative indicates the payment of accumulated debts. It also indicates that this vision may indicate the collapse of problems and disputes that occur between relatives and living happily and peacefully. Perhaps also, seeing the dead again in a dream indicates that the dreamer will join a new job and the large amount of money and profits he earns. Interpretation of seeing a dead person die in a complete dream for a woman in the form of a vessel If an ordinary girl sees a vision of a dead person and this person is unknown, then this dream indicates the betrayal she found from her lover. Also, if a girl sees that she is killing a dead person in a complete dream, then this vision indicates that she has a lot of worries and she is a materialistic girl. Also, seeing a dead person in a dream, and that person was her father, indicates that her back is broken and the barrier Broken and wants someone to protect her. Interpretation of seeing the dead die again in a dream for a married woman The interpretation of seeing the dead husband return in a dream is complete, and this indicates her lack of resourcefulness and her need to achieve what her husband wanted in his life. Seeing the dead return in a dream full of a married woman is one of the desirable visions and indicates that she is about to get rid of her problem and get what she wants. Interpretation of seeing a dead father die again If a person dreams in a complete dream of the death of his son again and he died a long time ago, this indicates his urgent need and not birth, and God knows best. Also, seeing the father die again indicates the death of worry and repentance for sins, transgressions and immorality that the dreamer was doing in his life. This vision also indicates good deeds, closeness to God, a new job, and an abundance of livelihood from lawful money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead return to life and then die If a person sees in a dream his complete death and then returns to life, this indicates his strong ties with God Almighty and shows his faith in God. Also, seeing a stranger die and return to life indicates differences in one’s life and personal problems. Also, seeing the death of a man in A dream with a woman indicates the success and distinction that she will achieve in her life and the fulfillment of desires. The vision of the dead grandfather dying again in a dream is complete. If a person dreams in a complete dream of the death of the deceased grandmother again, this indicates the good condition of the dreamer, and God knows best. Also, this vision for the pious woman indicates her blessed and righteous marriage to the right person for her, God willing. This vision indicates

title: Interpretation of family in a dream Seeing family in a dream

preview.html: Seeing my family or relatives gathered at home, whether the husband’s family, guests, or meeting relatives at a bachelorette party for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of family in a dream. Interpretation of a family gathering at home, or seeing family members at home gathering, talking, or screaming. , or eating, or doing something nice or unpopular, can carry an interpretation between good and evil, as commentators explain.Interpretation of family gathering at home: Whoever sees that the parents are residing in the same house at home and sees them moving and moving from one place to another as if it were a normal life, Then there will be good news for him that will benefit his family. If the parents are with them. Family members who do not live in the same house, if the topic is happy, it is joy for the family or a marriage for the monarch, and if the topic seems sad to them, it is the death of a loved one or the dismissal of someone who saves or loses a lot of money. But if the parents are together sitting or standing in Part of the house, they talk about their affairs, so if their face, speech, or condition are good, this brings goodness and pleasure to the observer, and if their condition indicates unhappiness or unhappiness. Sadness then indicates distress, illnesses and misfortunes to the monarch. In the event that there are relatives who are not residents of the house and it is pleasant in their seat, kindness prevails in the family and does not stop with the dreamer, as well as sadness. And when you see the parents gathering to eat at home, if they are all residing in the same house, the pleasant food and kindness will prevail over them, If relatives are with them outside the home, the kindness and food will be shared from their relatives, and if there are strangers, they will be the cause or accomplices of this good, and if the fortuneteller is the one who offers the food, then he will have the order of the family, and the money. And mercy is in his hand. As for the one who finds parents, everyone looks at him. If the subject is happy, then it is the achievement of what he aspired to, happiness or marriage, and if sadness looks at him, then it is illness, misfortune or separation from a loved one in life. If a person dreams With his harmonious and happy family, it symbolizes abundant health and easy circumstances. But if there is illness or disagreement, this portends gloom and disappointment. Interpretation of increasing the number of family members in a dream. If you dream of increasing your family members, this may mean failure in some of your projects and success in others. If you dream of an increase in your work, it means that you will overcome current problems. Ibn Sirin’s vision of the family – YouTube

title: Interpretation of dream number one in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number one in a dream Seeing the number one in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate success, prosperity, excellence, and indicates good character. This article sees the number one in a dream in detail on the Qimma website. Number 1 in a married man’s dream. It indicates new beginnings, changes in his life. For the better. Repeating the number one in a dream. It indicates a prestigious position and good fortune. The number A in a single woman’s dream indicates a positive change in her life, the fulfillment of her desires and a happy marriage. Interpretation of a watch in a dream for a married woman: It indicates a prestigious position or a promotion at work for her or her husband. Interpretation Seeing the number one in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried woman sees in her first dream, this means that she has a good reputation in her surroundings and in life in general, and that she will also marry a young man of good character. But if an unmarried girl sees multiples of the number one in her dream, this means That she will enjoy a bright, brilliant future full of success. If an unmarried girl sees numbers other than one in her dream, this means that she will marry a good man, and these numbers indicate the number of months of the engagement period, which will pass before the marriage period. You may be interested in knowing: The accident in a dream. Interpretation of a vision The number one in a dream for a married and pregnant woman. The dream interpretation of seeing the first dream for a married woman indicates that she will enjoy abundance in her life and will be close to God. If a married woman sees multiples of the number 1 in her dream, it means that she will have many children and they will help her in her old age. If a married woman sees multiples of the number 1 in her dream, it means that she will have many children and they will help her in her old age. The number 7 in her dream, this indicates the presence of problems and disagreements in her married life. But if a pregnant woman sees the number one in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a healthy child. Good manners and her pregnancy period will be easy, oh my God. If a pregnant woman sees the number two in her dream, this means that God will give her twins, God willing. As it has been said by dream interpretation scholars: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream an odd number, such as one, three, five etc. Evidence that God will bless her with a boy, but if she sees the number of the pair, such as two, four, six, and so on...this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, God willing. You may be interested in knowing: The death of a child in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the number one in a dream for a man. If a man dreams With the number one, this indicates that he is alone throughout his life and suffers from many psychological crises, but he will overcome them, God willing. If a man in a dream has multiples of the number one, this means that he is suffering from family and work problems as well, and is having difficulty solving or overcoming them. And if An unmarried person saw the number one in his dream, this indicates that he is facing difficulty in finding his life partner and that he will delay marriage. Interpretation of seeing numbers in the sky: A dream about the number one in the sky indicates to the dreamer that it is a warning from God Almighty, to turn away from the sins he has committed and repent for mistakes. Which he commits, so he prays regularly and recites the Qur’an. And performing the duties of Islam that we are commanded

title: Interpretation of miscarriage in a dream and the child falling in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a baby being aborted for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and Imam Al-Sadiq, the fetus falling from its mother’s womb, for a virgin, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a miscarriage for single, married, and pregnant women. If you dream that you had an abortion in a dream and are looking for evidence and explanations about that, we will provide it to you. In detail.Interpretation of a miscarriage in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s miscarriage does not cause her any fear, because this dream can be the result of excessive anxiety about the condition of the fetus, especially in the first months of pregnancy. A pregnant woman’s miscarriage can indicate the completion of the pregnancy, God willing. Whoever sees that she is pregnant In a dream and she miscarries her fetus, the dream may indicate problems and obstacles that she is going through and there may be bad behavior in some matters. Abortion in a married woman’s dreams may indicate her fear of pregnancy, especially if there was a previous experience of her or someone she knows agreeing to an abortion in a dream Whether for yourself or for others, this dream may indicate things that stop or falter. For an unmarried girl, if she is pregnant in a dream and sees an abortion, this may mean that she will get rid of worries and problems, but with difficulty. Interpretation of abortion in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars interpreted the unmarried girl who A miscarriage seen in a dream is a harbinger of an important breakthrough and facilitation of matters. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she had an abortion, this is an indication that this girl was facing some problems and difficulties, physical or emotional, which will soon be resolved. Interpretation of a miscarriage in a dream for a married womanIf she had an abortion A married woman in a dream or had surgery or opened a wound in her abdomen, this is evidence that this woman may face some problems that stand in her way due to her exposure to revelation and concealment of her secrets. In her married life. If a married woman sees that she has had a miscarriage in a dream, this is a sign of this woman’s pregnancy or loss of the problems and difficulties that this woman faced during the previous period. preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of being completely naked in a dream in different cases from Ibn Sirin. The dreams among their events carry many symbols and signs with different connotations in the life of the visionary. Between promising or ominous dreams, people search for the correct interpretations of their dreams to know what the coming days will bring for them. To help decipher the ambiguity of some dreams, we present to you today the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees a naked woman in a dream from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretations of a dream of being completely naked. Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream By Ibn Sirin Muhammad Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream is similar to the interpretations of most Muslim scholars such as Ibn Khaldun, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen, where he said in his interpretation that the appearance of a naked woman in a dream is one of the symbols that reveals and exposes something offensive in this man’s life that he has been trying to hide for a long time. He sees a naked woman in his dream as a sign of his weakness in the face of the crises and difficulties that he suffers from in his life. This vision is also an indication of the weakness of his character in front of others and his inability to prove himself. In dealing with them. Also, seeing a person naked in general in a dream symbolizes that the person is going through a period of psychological instability and turmoil in social or professional circumstances, which makes the person feel insecure or reassured during this time. Whoever sees himself naked in a dream in front of the public With extreme shame, this indicates that he will be exposed to a great financial loss, and God knows best. And whoever sees himself naked and people look at him to see his nakedness, this is a sign of his divorce from his wife or the approaching death of him, and God knows best. And whoever sees himself naked, this means that he has uncovered and revealed something that he hid from people. Also, whoever sees that someone is taking off his clothes in a dream, then he is your enemy in reality and is trying to get rid of you. Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream for a man according to Ibn Sirin that whoever sees a naked woman in a dream and she does not reveal her nakedness, then this vision is good news, represented by solving his problems or removing his worries and relieving him. His debts if that person is in. Debt. Whoever sees a naked woman exposing her nakedness, and sees himself looking at her, this vision is evidence that its owner is committing sins and sins and following desires and forbidden things. Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a naked woman in a dream for an unmarried woman in general, whether she is naked or another woman. It means that you are revealing something that has been hidden for a long time. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is naked in front of an unknown man, and she is not ashamed, it means that she made a mistake with one of the men, so she repents, pays attention, and prevents herself. Whoever does what is forbidden. While if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is naked in front of a man she knows, this is good news that she will soon marry a good man who has morals and religion. And when an unmarried woman sees in her dream an unknown naked woman, this vision is an indication that she will be able to Achieving her ambitions and succeeding in study or work, and God knows best. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees that she is naked somewhere in front of an audience that looks at her very shy, then these visions

title: All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of the dream of breaking a phone screen in detail

preview.html: Seeing a broken mobile phone screen is considered one of the negative visions that stems from an individual’s preoccupation with work or emotional life. This vision has many warning signs that are intended to wake the viewer up before it is too late, and the vision varies. Depending on various factors and according to many details that a person says, there is a difference in interpreting the difference between a man and a woman in the event that they are single or married, and in this article we take a look at all the signs of brokenness. Phone screen. Dream interpretation of a cracked mobile phone screen. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream expresses many things, including that the dreamer is on a date with a lot of long-awaited news, and this news will change a lot in his life. As for whether the news is good or bad, this depends on The cell phone itself. If it is healthy and not scratched or new, then this foretells to the viewer that what he is waiting for is being achieved and that the goal set for many will be achieved soon. But with regard to the interpretation of the dream of breaking a phone screen, this vision indicates that there is disturbing news that will cause the dreamer a lot of sadness and anxiety or the appearance of fluctuations. A surprise that he did not imagine would happen. This vision shows that the dreamer has certain expectations and firmly believes that it will happen one day, but he is surprised that the opposite of his expectations will happen. If he sees a crack on the phone screen, this indicates the many problems he faces during this period and the difficulty of escaping from them or finding a solution. Quickly, these problems may be at the work level, between family members. Or in his relationship with the one he loves. If he is single, then his vision indicates his disappointment or hearing something that does not satisfy him and causes him many problems, which may force him to make a unilateral decision in a moment of anger that is difficult to undo. The interpretation of the vision is related to the reason that led to The screen is cracked, so if the viewer is the actor and the cause of this, then this indicates crises that he has a hand in, or disputes that break out between him. And one of them, and his intervention in them is more like fire than burning. But if the screen breaks without his intervention, this symbolizes the betrayal of the other or the disaster that befell him and affected him severely, or the news that happened to her and caused her a great shock. But if he sees that he is talking on the cell phone and after the end of the call He found that the screen was broken, as this indicates a great estrangement between the viewer and the person he is talking to, or negative feelings between him and the person he is talking to. Another party, and it is not permissible for him to reveal his feelings of hurt or hurt that he feels towards that person. And if you see that you are playing with your phone and then it falls to the ground and the screen breaks, this indicates mismanagement, management, manipulation, underestimating the feelings of others, and entering into experiences and relationships without planning for the future of these. Relationships or the results of experiences. A vision from this point of view indicates a person’s failure to perform his duties in the manner required of him, or complete dependence on others, or a misjudgment of the blessings and opportunities available to the dreamer, which exposes him to many long crises. Term.of

title: Interpretation of socks in a dream and seeing socks in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of socks is obtaining halal money and other interpretations, and we interpret it for the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, such as seeing black women’s socks while wearing white, red or yellow socks and buying torn, long, short, clean or dirty socks from Ibn Sirin and others in Thread follow: Interpretation of socks in a dream. Seeing socks in a dream is evidence that money comes to the dreamer, and his or her good smell of socks in a dream is evidence of legitimate money. Smelling an unpleasant odor from socks in a dream is evidence of forbidden and stolen money, and seeing old socks in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is hindering charity in life. And seeing socks New ones in a dream are evidence of a person’s great conviction. Seeing socks in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s flaws in life and weaknesses in it. You are watching cleaning socks in a dream about the strong personality that a person has, and torn socks in a dream are very thin personal items. Seeing socks with a bad smell in a dream Evidence that you are trying to hide your weaknesses in life. Lending a loan to a friend in a dream or a stranger is evidence of a feeling of loneliness and loss in a person’s life. Giving socks to someone you do not know in a dream is evidence of fear and weakness of character. Also, seeing white socks in a pregnant woman’s dream It also indicates her health and the safety of the fetus. Wearing socks for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that the birth process is approaching. A pregnant woman who sees herself washing socks or perfumed socks is evidence of major positive changes in her life. A sock in a dream is money and protection, unless worn. He saw in a dream that he was wearing socks, then he saved his money, even if he had a mother who migrated with her. If the sock smells good and is new, then its owner pays zakat and preserves his money with it, and praise is good for it. But if it is old and worn out, then he preserves zakat and charity and does not He pushes it, and wastes his money. If it smells bad, then the praise was bad. The sock is expressed by the servant, the woman, and the maid. Seeing socks in a dream generally indicates money and protection, if you do not wear them in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing socks, this symbolizes that this person will save his money to waste. Whoever saw socks in a dream and this person had a mother traveling with his mother. Whoever saw In a dream, socks have a pleasant and refreshing smell, and those socks were new, this indicates that the dreamer pays zakat and wants to protect his money from being wasted. Whoever sees socks in a dream, and those socks were smelly, torn, and unusable, this means that he does not pay zakat or He believes, because his money is about to expire and be lost. Seeing socks in a dream means that the dreamer will live with himself and go to suspicious places. If a girl sees in a dream that she is wearing torn socks, this means that this girl will deal with people in an obscene and immoral way. But if the girl sees She wears white stockings, this symbolizes
